definition: to wish for/to desire/variant of 慾|欲[yu4]
to follow one's heart's desires/to do as one pleases (idiom)
to be eager to give sth a try (idiom)
lit. ready to appear at the call (idiom)/fig. on the verge of coming out into the open/(of a person's choice etc) on the point of being disclosed/(of an artistic depiction) vividly portrayed
to begin to stir (idiom)/to get restless/to become threatening
lit. fluently saying all one wants (idiom); to preach freely on one's favorite topic/to hold forth to one's heart's content
want to stop but can't (idiom)/to be unable to stop oneself/to feel an urge to continue
to be so in pain as to not want to live/to be so grieved as to wish one were dead

sentences.english: Despite his 2 fruitless visits, Liu Xuande resolved to pay another call on Kongming.
sentences.chinese: 却说玄德访孔明两次不遇，欲再往访之。

sentences.english: He who would lead must first command himself.
sentences.chinese: 欲领导他人的人必须先统御自己。

sentences.english: Zhao Zilong reported to you that Jingzhou is facing danger, you wanna go back, so you came up with this idea.
sentences.chinese: 方才赵子龙报说荆州危急，你欲还乡，故推此意。

sentences.english: When I am about to nod off in the office, the boss walked in.
sentences.chinese: 我在办公室刚刚欲睡，老板走了进来。

sentences.english: Her delicate constitution disinclined her from such an arduous job.
sentences.chinese: 她纤弱的体质使得她不欲担任如此艰钜的工作。

sentences.english: Lushen ( a goddess in Chinese myth) was a symbol of feeling and desire.
sentences.chinese: 洛神原型是情与欲的象征。

sentences.english: Lounge patrons desperately wanted to imbibe the essence of all this.
sentences.chinese: 酒吧的老主顾们极欲将全部精华吸收殆尽。

sentences.english: Jeff lowered himself to a ledge five feet down and tried to calm them.
sentences.chinese: 杰夫爬下一块五英尺高的礁石，欲安抚他们。

sentences.english: Second, the material of the wish to no longer limited to financial treatment.
sentences.chinese: 其二，物质性的欲不再只限于经济待遇。

sentences.english: Lou Artemisia Montreal Lo buds short, is to globefish when.
sentences.chinese: “蒌蒿满地芦芽短，正是河豚欲上时”。

sentences.english: People have emotions, feelings did not ring true To reach the grief of Health.
sentences.chinese: 人有七情六欲，情不顺欲不达则悲生。

sentences.english: Please enter the designated numbers and then click Enter.
sentences.chinese: 输入欲检索的释文条号，按确定键进行检索。

sentences.english: I wish to apply for Automatic Add Value Service for Supplementary Credit Cardholder.
sentences.chinese: 本人欲为附属卡客户申请自动增值服务。

sentences.english: We thank you for your consideration in making us the consignment of 30 bales of cotton goods.
sentences.chinese: 贵方欲委托敝公司销售棉织品30包，我方不胜感激。

sentences.english: China mulls harsher penalties for food safety crimes.
sentences.chinese: 中国欲严惩食品安全犯罪。

sentences.english: Xu master know that very angry after the second day go to teach them.
sentences.chinese: 徐老爷得知后很生气欲第二天去去教训他们。

definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
lit. an ant trying to shake a tree/to overrate oneself (idiom)
lit. the mountains crumble and the trees lie ruined/a great sage has died (idiom)
